website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a handy, everyday cosmetic bag that you can take with you in your purse, this clutch is absolutely perfect.
pros: Waterproof and easy to clean, this shell-shaped bag is big enough for your daily makeup, sunglasses, keys, and other necessities
Inside zipper provides space for credit cards or other discreet items
cons: Some found it too small for practical use

customer_reviews.title: A nice bag!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! It fits a lot! I got the purple color and it is very nice! It even comes with a second bigger black cloth bag! If you look at my photos you can see I fit a lot of brushes into that bag and I still have a bit of room for more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very nice! It seems of exceptionally high quality. I'm very happy with my purchase. It's just big enough to hold all of my cosmetics comfortably, but small enough to fit in my bad or purse (: I love the color's, and I love the care that seems to be put into it. This bag comes with another pull string bag to protect the pouch. It's very nice, everything was of a good quality.

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSIVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: For such a small bag, it fits a lot of product! All my essentials fit comfortably with a little room to spare. Far better quality, and much cuter than the stuff you can find at CVS for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Natty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in Every Way and Easy to Locate in my Purse
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and easy to use quality zipper. Zipper is so nice I can open with one hand, no need to hold onto cosmetic bag. Beautiful color stands out in my purse...doesn’t get lost in the ‘darkness’ of the abyss. Perfect size for essential cosmetics and their equipment. Its empty configuration is small, but can expand if more items are added. Doesn’t hog space, is lint repellent and easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Stylish with a Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bag is amazing! You can feel the quality. The color I wanted was out of stock so I went with black. The item came packed and inside the clutch, one of those toss away shopping bags but what was surprising other than the quality was the deep maroon color I found inside the dual lined cosmetic bag. I'm totally buying a few more, for the price and the quality of the product are by far the best I've seen in a very ling time - buy it you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vixen No.36

customer_reviews.title: Minor disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The bag is everything everyone has already said in terms of being sturdy, well made, and roomy without being big and bulky. I was hoping for the red lining instead of cocoa brown, and an internal mirror would have been nice But I am overall pleased with it. No more expensive eye pencils or lipsticks being beaten up by rattling around in my purse!
customer_reviews.author: Fay Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the Best
customer_reviews.text: I bought three different cosmetic pouches to pack toiletries for a stay in the hospital and then a rehab facility. This one is hands down, the best! It is so classy and glamorous. I particularly like the lovely red lining and inside zipper pocket. It is a generous size without being bulky. It’s so pretty that I’m considering using it as a handbag for semi-formal events. It wears well and cleans up beautifully. I accidentally squirted some lotion on it and I was able to remove every trace with just a damp cloth. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: CeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and the perfect size for my makeup needs!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size and a definite upgrade from my tiny old makeup bag. I was surprised at the quality, especially that they included a dust bag. The material quality is very nice and the zipper glides pretty smoothly. What I liked the most was the capacity of it: I now have extra room to look for things versus having to dump everything out. I totally love it and would definitely recommend. I will probably be getting the black one soon! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: SillyGurl

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cosmetic pouch is such a beautifully designed accessory; Wonderful texture inside and out. There is plenty of room for cosmetics or miscellaneous items (i.e: pens, ear plugs, small charger, small jewelry, pads, candy, etc)....has extra storage space with a inner zippered pocket as well. ************************************* I do wish they had one more inner pocket though, to use to separate more items, but for the size (small to medium) it does the job for all my basics. I’ll have to order another one that’s a bit bigger or has additional pockets for what I need though....but this pouch didn’t disappoint....I would Definitely Recommend and Buy again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for every-day on-the-go makeup routine
customer_reviews.text: (Daniel's wife): This bag is the perfect size for my everyday makeup, including a large mascara, foundation, blush, brow gel, concealer, rectangular shadow pallet, liner, large mascara, and 2 lipsticks. It has an inside zipper pocket where I keep my tweezers. Material is sturdy and stain-resistant, soft inside liner, and the color is very nice. The zipper doesn't open so wide that things go spilling out. Great bag, great price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Romero

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke easily
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke within three weeks of me using it. I brought it with me for international travel to keep my makeup organized and unbroken, but when the zipper broke I had to use hair ties to keep it together. By the way, it was not overstuffed- I am quite the minimalist. I love the color and the outside material of the product. If only the interior and zipper quality were the same, I would give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love this little case!
customer_reviews.text: I like to switch bags a lot, so I like to have all my little comfort items and medicine together for an easy transition. This is perfect for that. It is also the perfect size for a pencil case, so I may be buying another for that purpose. The zipper is smooth and feels sturdy. I also bought the larger version for my chargers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rae

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of this pouch for the price. I was looking for a small makeup bag to replace an old one that was not too big since I don't have a lot of makeup (and wanted motivation to keep it that way with not enough space to add more cosmetics).The zipper works great and the materials looks classy and nice. I love the gray color.. It's a sophisticated looking makeup bag and works great. I highly recommend this bag for small items.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite makeup bag
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite makeup bag. I just ordered my third and will be giving one as a gift! It feels so high quality for the price and as I’ve mentioned before, I love that the interior comes in different colors and not just black. Idk if I other people feel this way but I have a hard time seeing my black colored eyeliners & mascaras against black interior pouches. The only negative is that the emerald color, the picture makes the interior look like it’s a light brown but it’s actually a darker brown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag
customer_reviews.text: I use mine as a nail kit. I can fit a buffer (with replacements), 2 nail files, nail cutters, 2 bottles of nail polish and cuticle cuter. There is a little zipper pocket inside to keep smaller things seperate. I love it. Very nice quality and easy to pack in a bag. Could be used as a makeup bag or a travel toiletry bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds my necessities at work. Great size
customer_reviews.text: This pouch is sturdy and water resistant. I got this because I needed a pouch that could hold small necessities while at work. I can fit my phone, cards, cash, a powder compact, lip balm, and a 2oz hand sanitizer bottle. The zipper runs smooth and has a square metal zipper pull attached.
customer_reviews.author: Belladonna

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and its smaller companion to fit in a large leather tote I purchased that had a large snap in pouch that a was useless; everything just fell to the bottom. I keep all my large thing in the larger and small items in the smaller pouch. Works great! Now I can find what I need just by looking in the right bag and still have plenty of room in my purse for my reader and phone and still plenty of room for an umbrella and other items. And I really like the style, color and the material.
customer_reviews.author: nanc

customer_reviews.title: A++ across the board!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE, this is perfect for my makeup, just the right size for my makeup brushes and with most bags I am very cautious with the zipper because they are usually flimsy and get stuck. Not with this one, the zipper glides with ease, it honestly feels like luxury, like I spent $100 when in reality the price was phenomenal. I'm so excited to keep using this and I would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: good bag
customer_reviews.text: i've had this bag for over 2 years and used it to hold my makeup everyday. it has held up the whole time with no issues. it's a nice shape that stays open/standing up when you sit it on a table, and it's easy to travel with. highly recommend this for a makeup bag!
customer_reviews.author: Eskimino Thunderbunny

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Intially I loved this bag. So much, that I purchased two! One in magenta, which is a gorgeous color and one in purple. They came with gift bags and appeared to be of high quality and I love the inside zipper and color. About 8 zips out and the zipper broke! So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MrsMommyLoves7

customer_reviews.title: These bags are FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about how much I like the CHICECO travel bags! I do a ton of traveling but almost never check a bag — I use this size for my makeup and the next size up for toiletries. They're sturdy, wipe down easily, and honestly just look really nice. You absolutely can not beat this price for the quality you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: My color done right
customer_reviews.text: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐my color of course. It may hold hearing aid accoutrements. It may hold diabetes gear. It may hold make up. Versitile excellent quality. Stitching beautiful. Will last a long and beautiful time. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEEEE IT!!! Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for school to put my pencils, pens, and etc. I absolutely love it! I’m those types that don’t like the casual pencil pouches lol & this is the perfect fit for me. No to mention it came with a cute bag inside the bag lol I wasn’t expecting that! Also I love the red color inside of it!! Material and everything is what you pay for if anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and Sleek
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by this bag! The zipper is smooth and the bag is made of sturdy material. The best part is that it holds all of my makeup (with room to spare). Mascara, eyeliner, concealer, brow gel, and a bunch of lipsticks & glosses all fit comfortably in this bag. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little pouch! It is super cute and can easily be converted to a clutch if I want to take it out for the night, but I primarily use it for makeup storage. I wasn't sure if it would be big enough, even though I don't use that much makeup on a daily basis, but it fits my makeup easily. For reference, I have foundation primer, foundation, foundation brush, two eyeliner pencils, eyebrow brush, concealer, highlighter, mascara, blush, and blush brush all in the main pouch, and then I keep four eyeshadows and one eyeshadow brush in the inside zipper pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly roomy
customer_reviews.text: It's surprisingly roomy! It's been able to hold a majority of my essentials and has been holding up really well. The packaging was very nicely done and I appreciate the extra dust bag. The color is a vibrant but not gaudy coral and it's just super cute :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great bag; bad zippers.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this bag 5 stars, because I do truly love it. However, I've been using it for just over a month now and the inner zipper has completely separated and that pocket is now completely useless to me. Really disappointing as this inner zipper pocket was a big selling point for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kersten

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this cosmetic bag as a work bag to store little useful things like chapstick, cash, feminine care items, and other items I need while I’m working. Perfect small sized bag, very spacious inside and the zipper inside is spacious as well. Love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: minty & kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading the other reviews and the product did not dissapoint. I was impressed that it came in a dust pouch, especially for the price point. I bought this to use more as a purse organizer opposed to a makeup bag. Either way the pouch is very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: wgjonz

customer_reviews.title: Well made makeup bag that holds more than you think
customer_reviews.text: More spacious than I was expecting. Nicely lined interior sturdy construction. Fits my pressed powder blush, 3 brushes (lip brush, retractable kabuki, powder foundation), pressed powder compact, eyeshadow, mascara, tube of concealer, liquid lip gloss, tube of lipstick, lip balm, compact mirror, tweezers, lip liner and sharpener without fuss. Zipper is well made. I purchased the bag in black. Smudges on outside of bag wipe off well. Decent price for a well made bag.
customer_reviews.author: DiaLenaLeina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and well made material. I love it! I plan to order the larger one and totes bag for traveling. Yes, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Quintin W.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a grown-up version of a pen/pencil case, and this has worked out great. The color very closely matched my bag, and the nylon was thick and had a nice (not cheap) texture. The lining is a beautiful coordinating color. It's bigger than any other pen/pencil case I have ever owned, which was perfect for my needs! As a cosmetic/makeup bag, it would be great. It has held up well in my bag- no easy feat. Even though I have had it for over a month, it looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dukes

customer_reviews.title: I purchased it by all the good reviews. When I received it I was disappointed ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes this makeup bag look small. I purchased it by all the good reviews. When I received it I was disappointed because it seemed like it wouldn't hold much. I was pleasantly surprised that is stretched out and also held all the makeup i was needing. This bag is well made, good quality fabric and I also like that the inside zipper pocket is big enough to hold all my eyeliners. I will definitely be purchasing a second bag! I got it in Turquoise and the color is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great for every day makeup and traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling! I got this for the purpose of traveling with my every day makeup. It is on the smaller side, so bigger pallets will not fit. The bag is very sturdy and seems to be easy to clean! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karely

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little purse for my 86 year old mom who needed it to take to Bingo. It looks small at first, but it actually holds a lot. Her bingo chips, lipstick, mirror, hairbrush, cell phone and more! And the color is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: This little cosmetic bag was the perfect size for my purse. It held all the cosmetics and odds and ends I wanted to carry. I love the teal color and it seems very durable and can be spot cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherinMontana

customer_reviews.title: Small but perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid this would be too big to fit in my purse. It’s the perfect size! It looks like it’ll be too small to fit anything but the inside is wide and fits all your makeup needs. Perfect little makeup bag. Black looks classy too
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Make  up bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I absolutely loved it!! Very large and roomy and exactly what I was looking for! Great price and value and craftsmanship for the money!! Well order more! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SALLY LANCE

customer_reviews.title: 9 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: These really are beautiful travel bags. I have a few. My one complaint: I accidently purchased one more than I needed (my bad) and realized after the fact that this company doesn't appear to do free returns, which surprises me b/c it's such a great product and so many others do.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Zipper malfunction after short use.
customer_reviews.text: What a great makeup bag. Nice size that fits a lot of makeup in it. Love that is long and wide enough for compacts, brushes & many lipsticks. Very pleased with it. Update: ZIPPER broke🙁
customer_reviews.author: Mina00

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this pouch a while back but it's still looking just like new. It's just the perfect size to keep everything I used to dump at the bottom of my bag, from medicine to make up.
customer_reviews.author: Argosvan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by this little makeup bag, it looks and feels very nice. Holds a LOT of stuff, don't let its size fool you. One of the best makeup bags I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: I love this makeup bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup bag! Feels like it was expensive but it was really cheap. the only thing that I would suggest is to make a medium sized one. The big one is too big and the small one is... well small but it would be nice to have an intermediate one. I love the color and I will repurchase the big one and the small one!
customer_reviews.author: Estephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised with this makeup bag. It is a little bigger than my previous one but it is definitely nicer and of better quality. It fits all my makeup (powder, 5 lipsticks, lip balm, eyeliners, mascara, lip liners and face mattening wipes) plus a small bottle of hand lotion AND I still have more than enough space to throw in some more! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: 5050hxa

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag, can hold way more than expected
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this makeup case. It can fit a lot. However, the zipper toggle did break off. But I would still buy this again. I also appreciate that it is a structured case. It will stand up and not topple over when I place it on the bathroom counter
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such good quality. I thought this was just going to be just a little makeup bag but when I opened it such good quality I am so amazed and the amount of products you can put in it. Definitely recommend this and I hardly ever leave reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Vega

customer_reviews.title: Best cosmetic bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! Can I just say that I'm so in love with this comestic bag?! The quality is top rated, quality material and design. Appears small when you first get it, but opens up very well with added makeup items. Get this bag, you won't regret it. I got two colors and I'm glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this little pouch!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for work for when I need to freshen up after lunch. It holds a travel size toothbrush, paste and mouth wash. It also holds my body spray, deodorant and a lipstick. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my cosmetics. The inside is red which makes it easier to find items. It also opens wide which is something I was looking for as that too makes it easier to find items. Seems to be well made but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: SSL California

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the compartements In the case
customer_reviews.text: I know this product is listed as a cosmetic pouch but I was looking for a case that was cute and efficient for my school supplies. I absolutely love the compartements In the case. There's a pocket inside that perfect for holding post-its, stickers and labels. The main compartment was large enough to fit roughly 12 pens, pencils, highlighters etc. Not sure if I was filling the case to maximum capacity but I had to give it a 4 star only because the little chain used to close the case came off after a month of purchasing the item. Zipper is still intact though.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Love This Handy Dandy Makeup Pouch
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Take it with me everywhere I go! Very sturdy material and holds everything I need on a daily basis. I have prob about 15 lipsticks, lip pencils, mascara, a comb, etc...in this one bag. It fits nicely into my pocketbook too!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have the xlarge tote bag, the large makeup pouch, and now the small makeup pouch. All three are my favorites, great quality, well made, and I am going to purchase a few more of the small pouches. Would definitely be interested if this company made wallets or a in between sized pouch.
customer_reviews.author: L Schlegel

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable bag for make up and toiletries
customer_reviews.text: This was a pleasant surprise. I needed a smaller makeup bag for travel, and bought this one because of the cute yellow color and and good reviews. This makeup bag is really high quality, almost like a neoprene material on the outside. Nicely lined on the inside. Holds a great amount of makeup/stuff without being too large & cumbersome. Like an oversized pencil case.
customer_reviews.author: nourishednomad

customer_reviews.title: Such a GREAT Pouch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good convenient little bag perfect size not too big not too little, I wanted it for school for my pens and highlighters and everything fits perfectly. Bag is super sleek and the quality feels great! Will definitely be buying another one for my makeup!!
customer_reviews.author: sharline lemus

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy bag with heavy-duty zipper
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bag for storing items that need to be collected together in my handbag. It is a sturdy bag, and nail files and scissors won't go poking through the fabric. The zipper is strong, too. I was very agreeably surprised in this item.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this originally to hold my crochet needles and equipment for when I travel. I like it so much I’m buying another one for my actual makeup. Great quality, great color, and foldable.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy & Classy

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful cosmetics bag and it's perfect for all of my makeup. It has a lot of room inside. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Savory

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a place to hold my lipgloss and whatever else. This is perfect for just that. It's not too big that it's bulky and gets in the way. But it's large enough to hold make up, medication, perfume, etc. The inside is black so it hides marks well. I'll definitely be getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of products and is really cute
customer_reviews.text: Really cute pouch and holds a ton of products in it. I have lipsticks, napkins, lotion, etc, in it and carry it from purse to purse when I switch them. Makes things a lot easier
customer_reviews.author: Madelene Cruz

customer_reviews.title: I love this little bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bag! I was skeptical about buying it because I was not sure how spacious it would be but after reading all the comments, I can honestly say that this little bag is the perfect cosmetic or pencil bag! It truly does fit well into a large purse or bag, I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Connie B

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bag.
customer_reviews.text: Chiceco makeup clutch is beautifully made. The navy color is elegant and it's a joy to use. I use it for keeping my colored pencils and it's perfect for storing, carrying and keeping everything together. It holds 48 Prisma colors, eraser and blending pencil. There's still room left for twice that much.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J. Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Although this was a makeup pouch, I bought it as a pencil bag and it is a perfect size for it. The size is not too big nor small so it could definitely be used as a makeup bag as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, and she was so happy to receive it. She asked me if it was $35. I am happy that I was able to make her happy with only $10. The quality was outstanding, and the size was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: I.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cosmetic Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Chiceco Cosmetic Pouch I have purchased. They are great to travel with and I can put cosmetics, hair accessories and miscellaneous items in each bag, all different colors, and find what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: I took this on one trip and the zipper broke. Maybe there was too much in it, but it didn't seem to be very sturdy with normal use. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: digger16309

customer_reviews.title: Liked so much I wanted a second one.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and a good size for all your cosmetics. I even came back looking for another one to put other things into. I wanted to use it like a ditty bag. However, the color choices were so depleted, I decided to wait until I could get another one the same or a complimentary color.
customer_reviews.author: ricracTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted bags to match my purse and replace my miscellaneous makeup bags. These are perfect for my work bag. The small one fit my glasses, glasses case, and business card holder with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Ryann

customer_reviews.title: Overall, it's a nice-looking clutch
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than what I was hoping for, and I wish it had a few more pockets on the inside like the larger bag. But overall, it's a nice-looking clutch and I have found a use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup bag, small but plenty of room for all your cosmetics and bushes.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice cosmetic bag. Very roomy. Bottom is flat, doesn’t tip over. Nice deep blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Bostonian

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 14 year old daughter to use as her pencil/pen pouch for high school. She really likes it a lot. It is roomy enough for her pencils, pens, tape, highlighters, and more.
customer_reviews.author: FLbeach003

customer_reviews.title: Confused Husband
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it (I think) and in reality isn't that all that matters? As for myself, not being well versed on cosmetic bags, I was a little shocked to see how small it was. I would like for Amazon to list measurements on these types of things instead of small, medium and large to assist those of us who don't normally purchase these types of things so that we have a better idea of what we will be buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very classy looking bag.
customer_reviews.text: This little bag is actually very classy. I got it as a "medicine bag" for my purse. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Turner

customer_reviews.title: Love this make up bag.
customer_reviews.text: This make-up bag is well made, attractive, looks durable and it is very functional. I did not give it five stars for travel because I would need something a bit larger for that purpose. But for daily use this was an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy E. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The tab to pull the zipper open or closed fell off day 1 it's easy to put back on but once it falls off it's only been by luck that I find it so......
customer_reviews.author: Ms Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good material, okay zipper charm
customer_reviews.text: Nice material but I need to fix the zipper. I took it out of the bag and the charm on the zipper fell right off. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag - I purchased it to put my make up in and it's exactly what I wanted. Great quality too - I've had it for some time now and have had no issues! I will purchase again once I get tired of black and want a different color :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good travel size
customer_reviews.text: This is light weight and small but surprisingly holds so much stuff. I bought this to replace a $30 Sephora bag I lost and I love this one more. I have a long train commute so everything I need fits in this bag and I'm able to do my makeup on the bag. Great price and great product
customer_reviews.author: PRGirl

customer_reviews.title: practical
customer_reviews.text: its been 5 months and the bag is great for school but can also hold basic makeup my only complaint is that the little diamond thing falls off every now and then but it still opens all the same w/o it
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! I bought this for discretely storing feminine products and it’s the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Ladylib

customer_reviews.title: Well made and perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Best smaller bag ever purchased! Great size! Highly recommend.. Would buy again for gifts and gift baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but to big for small handbag
customer_reviews.text: It was very nice but It did not fit in my small handbag.. returned for Smaller bag
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag , great material quality, good stitiching. Comes with a zipper pocket inside and a dust bag. Also bought a bigger one, photo for comparision. Won't fit a lot of full size makeup products but great for a short trip or everyday makeup bag. Opens up really wide so it's easy to find stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: ... looking for a brush bag and this is the perfect size. I have the large Chiceco cosmetic bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a brush bag and this is the perfect size. I have the large Chiceco cosmetic bag that I use as my main makeup bag and this fits inside of it nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a case to keep in my purse, that could hold my touch up make up. I chose this one because it looked well made and nice and I wanted a navy color. The item arrived ontime and was well packaged, but was more of a dark royal blue than a navy color. It also was so generic looking like it came from a drug store and was pretty small as well. I wouldn't pay more than $8.00 at the VERY most for this product. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Woneal

customer_reviews.title: Great Size to Throw in Purse
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to store my daily makeup essentials that I want to have with me at all times. Fits brushes, foundation, setting powder, mascara, eyelash curler, and lipstick/lipgloss easily. The color is great too! I would buy more of these to use a pencil case, store feminine products, and more!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Louie

customer_reviews.title: This makeup bag is perfect! It's pretty small
customer_reviews.text: This makeup bag is perfect! It's pretty small, but that's what I was looking for as I never have a ton of makeup at any given time. I got the watermelon color and it's much brighter in person but I don't mind that. It is made from a good material and has lasted me a good 6 months already without any issues. I look forward to using it for many more months to come!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: This is so nice in person
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice in person. Very well made. I'm using it for makeup in my large purse but this would be a very nice purse on its own to carry just a few items and it has a money compartment. Would buy as a gift for teachers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for school! As a college student it was hard finding a pouch to fit all my pens, highlighters etc. and I finally found one! Fits everything plus some! I may even order one for my makeup! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Bronaugh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Elegant makeup bag. I purchased for gift. I will be ordering one for myself
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: This pouch looks great and stylish also deep enough to carry a number of stuff I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than I expected but works perfectly for what I wanted. I have my essential oils, sage and mala beads and it all fits nicely. The zipper doesn't operate very smoothly, not poorly enough to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Sara VonMutius

customer_reviews.title: This bag is like a TARDIS: It's bigger on the inside
customer_reviews.text: This bag is HUGE on the inside and still fits in my purse. I carry all my makeup, my hand cream, brushes, lash curler etc and it still closes with no problems. Big thumbs up for this bag.
customer_reviews.author: ChiJadey

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Use these at work for patient anatomy models. Perfect size and discrete!
customer_reviews.author: Maria A. Stromer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect make up pouch, wont get crunched in your purse. Seems durrable.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this make up bag and I am very satisfied with the product. It arrived quickly and was packaged very nicely. Its constructed well. It has a sturdy form to it which I like. It's got plenty of room for my make up and feminine products. I was impressed with CHICECO'S packaging. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: These pouches are really good value! The right size for the intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these pouches in gray & claret, one for use as make-up bag & the other to hold my manicure set. These pouches are really good value! The right size for the intended purpose, really nice colors & they feel well made & should be durable. When I first started looking through the many, many options for cosmetic type pouches on Amazon, I found myself coming back to these Chiceco ones & I am glad a purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Ezmae

customer_reviews.title: A surprisingly perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: My entire 17 brush set fit perfectly along with my blush and bronzer and the inner pocket fit my stick concealer and other smaller make up. I thought it would not fit everything but to my surprise it did.
customer_reviews.author: island gal

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything I use perfectly. I put foundation, ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits everything I use perfectly. I put foundation, powder, bronzer, blush, eyebrow powder, eyeliner (2), mascara, concealer, two brushes, and an eyelash curler in the pouch. All of it fits and the bag still zips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it yesterday and it arrived in one day. I'm very impressed with the quality. Far exceeded my expectations. It's a very classic little bag and I love the burgundy lining inside. Yet although it looks small I can fit all of my everyday makeup products. 100% would recommend to any person.
customer_reviews.author: PoppyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Well it arrived fast.
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I expected. What disappointed me the worst is the color. It's a dingy color, not colorful like the picture. It is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Just big enough
customer_reviews.text: Subtle, durable, and cleans easily. I wish it had less of a logo, but I could probably take a blade to the seams and fix that.
customer_reviews.author: celeste

product_meta.title: CHICECO Handy Cosmetic Pouch Clutch Makeup Bag
feature_bullets: Oxford Nylon (1260D): waterproof and easy to clean
Shell shape with large capacity for keys, sunglasses, calculator, passport, mascara, lipstick, and powder
Toss it into purse,a perfect bag for everyday use
Inside zip stash pocket to stow jewelry, credit card or discreet items
Easy gold-tone metal zip closure; 7.5"L x 3.7"H x 3.2"D
